questions.q: How do I upgrade to the Pro or Team version?
questions.a: Simply click the button for the corresponding plan, complete the simple registration and payment process, and you can immediately upgrade and enjoy advanced features.

questions.q: Do paid plans support multiple devices?
questions.a: Yes, all paid plans support use on multiple devices and keep data consistent through cloud synchronization.

questions.q: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
questions.a: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time in account settings. After cancellation, you will continue to enjoy the current subscription cycle until it ends.

questions.q: How many users does the Team version support?
questions.a: The Team version base price includes 10 users. For more users, you can add them at ¥5/month per person (with additional discounts for annual payment).
